paper_title.ja: Allium fistulosum L.と A.schoenoprasum L.の類縁関係の細胞遺伝学的検討。
paper_title.en: Cytogenetic Relationship between Allium fistulosum L. and A. schoenoprasum L.

description.ja: Allium属植物中, 相互に近縁な異なる2節にそれぞれ分類されるA. fistulosum L.とA. schoenoprasum L.の類縁関係を検討するため, 2種(ともに2n=16)間のF_1雑種を作出し, 細胞遺伝学的調査を行った.雑種個体(2n=16)は両方向の相反交雑で胚または胚珠培養法により得られたが, A. fistu-losumを子房親にした組合せではその獲得率が極めて低かった.雑種個体の花粉母細胞減数分裂第一分裂中期では16_1または1_<II>+14_Iの対合型が最高頻度であり, 四分子期では四分子が最高頻度であったが, 二∿七分子も観察された.葯の発育については充実葯, 退化葯およびこれら両方をもつ個体に分かれた.充実葯をもつ個体では非還元性花粉が形成され, 染色花粉率は13∿65%であった.A. fistulosumとの戻交雑では次代植物は得られなかった.雑種個体の稔性回復を目的に染色体倍加個体を作出した.充実葯をもつ雑種個体由来の倍加個体では, 染色花粉率は64%であったが, 放任受粉およびA. fistulosumとの戻交雑では次代植物は得られなかった.一方, 葯が退化した雑種個体由来の倍加個体では, 葯は退化し, 花粉不稔性であった.以上の結果から, A. fistulosumとA. schoenoprasumはゲノムの相同性は非常に低く, 類縁性の程度が小さいことが明らかになった.
description.en: Interspecific hybrids between Allium fistulosum L. (2n=16) and A. schoenoprasum L. (2n=16) which are classified to different sections of the Allium were investigated cytogenetically to elucidate their relationship. Hybrid plants (2n=16) were produced by reciprocal crossings through embryo or ovule cultures, but the number of hybrid plants derived per pollinated flower was much smaller in the combination using A. fistulosum as a seed parent. At meiotic metaphase-I, chromosome parings of 16_1 or 1_<II>+14_I occurred frequently ; tetrads were observed together with dyads and heptads at tetrad stage. The hybrid plants exhibited three types of anther development ; a) fully developed form, b) aborted form or c) having both forms. Unreduced spherical pollen grains were observed in fully developed anthers. Pollen stainability ranged from 13 to 65%. No plant was obtained in the backcross with A. fistulosum. Chromosome doubled plants were produced through colchcine treatment of hybrid plants. In the chromosome doubled plant derived from the hybrid plant with fully developed anthers, pollen stainability was 64%. No seed was obtained through open pollination and crossing with A. fistulosum as a pollen parent. In the chromosome doubled plant derived from the hybrid plant with aborted anthers, anthers were aborted and were pollen-sterile. These results indicate that the homology between the genomes of A. fistulosum and A. schoenoprasum is low and that they are distantly related to each other cytogenetically.
